name: marko-vdom
description: Virtual DOM implementation for use with Marko and/or morphdom

scripts.test: npm run mocha && npm run jshint
scripts.test-coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- --ui bdd --reporter spec ./test/ && npm run jshint
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/all.js > dist/marko-vdom-umd.js --standalone MarkoVDOM

author: Patrick Steele-Idem <pnidem@gmail.com>
